index_terms: CHICAGO MILWAUKEE ST. PAUL PACIFIC RAILROAD
summary: AN ORDINANCE granting to Oregon-Washington Railroad and Navigation Company, an Oregon Corporation and it lessee Union Pacific Railroad Company, a Utah corporation, Washington Northern, Inc., a Delaware corporation - Chicago, Milwaukee, St. Paul and Pacific Railroad Company, a Wisconsin corporation, and to any one or more of them, their successors and assigns, a railway franchise over and across the easterly portions of East Marginal Way South from and between South Walker Street to South Hanford Street, until midnight December 31, 2000.
